title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama—chat, generate, embed, pull, list, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; chat, generate, embeddings, and model management.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: First-party LangChain integration—use Ollama models as LLMs, chat, or embeddings inside any LangChain pipeline.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Clean open-source web UI for Ollama—chat folders, model manager, code highlighting, multimodal, RAG.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API, streaming, embeddings, and custom timeout support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma/Qdrant; ingest PDFs and chat with your docs offline.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rich interactive CLI for Ollama with fuzzy model search, chat history, syntax highlighting, and plugins.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as inline Copilot suggestions with customizable prompts.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling, PVC, and ingress templates.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal Tauri desktop app for Ollama—chat, manage models, and monitor GPU usage in a native window.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for reproducible LLM tests.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for end-to-end NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama with Tokio, strongly-typed requests/responses, and SSE streaming.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama supporting chat, generate, embeddings, and Vision models with fluent configuration.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that streams Ollama answers into threads, supports slash commands and model swapping.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings local Ollama models into channels with context-aware threads and emoji reactions.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for offline AI assistance—summarize notes, generate flashcards, and Q&A over your vault.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official Ollama JavaScript package downloaded 100k+ times—same feature set as ollama-js repo.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official Python package on PyPI—install via pip and talk to Ollama in two lines of code.
